entry.title: New Date and Time API in Java8

entry.title: Evolution of Java
entry.summary: I thought it would be useful for java developers to understand how Java has evolved since its inception so that they are aware of what all capabilities they have access to when working with a particular version of Java.
entry.content: I thought it would be useful for java developers to understand how Java has evolved since its inception so that they are aware of what all capabilities they have access to when working with a particular version of Java.

entry.title: Choosing the right collection
entry.summary: Here is a quick guide for selecting the proper implementation of a Set, List, or Map in your application. The best general purpose or 'primary' implementations are likely ArrayList, LinkedHashMap, and LinkedHashSet. Their overall performance is better, and you should use them unless you need a special feature provided by another implementation ...
entry.content: Here is a quick guide for selecting the proper implementation of a Set, List, or Map in your application. The best general purpose or 'primary' implementations are likely ArrayList, LinkedHashMap, and LinkedHashSet. Their overall performance is better, and you should use them unless you need a special feature provided by another implementation ...

entry.title: Change default author name for JavaDocs in Eclipse
entry.summary: The auto generated Java docs at the class level picks the user name from the system user. This could result in weird author names in your code files as in an organization usernames are usually as per organizational naming conventions
entry.content: The auto generated Java docs at the class level picks the user name from the system user. This could result in weird author names in your code files as in an organization usernames are usually as per organizational naming conventions

entry.title: Remote debugging in Eclipse
entry.summary: To debug your application on JBOSS server you would need to enable the debugging on your JBOSS application server
entry.content: To debug your application on JBOSS server you would need to enable the debugging on your JBOSS application server
